programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: London, 1814. The entire city has turned out for the biggest Frost Fair in decades! But beneath the Thames, revelers are disappearing, snatched through the ice. Will the Doctor and Bill stop the slaughter before they too are dragged into the icy waters.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: When a sinister landlord shows Bill and her friends the perfect house-share, they have no idea what lies ahead.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Trapped on a space station with no oxygen, the Doctor, Bill, and Nardole are horrified to discover the automated spacesuits keeping them alive are also trying to kill them.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the Vatican's secret library lies a book that causes the reader to immediately take their own life. When a translation makes its way online, the Vatican appeals to the Doctor for help.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor is offered a deal by an alien race that would save humanity.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Bill and Nardole set out on a deadly mission to rescue the Doctor.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor arrives on Mars to discover that the Victorians have left their mark on the planet, causing a rift with the Ice Warriors.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A hunt for the lost Ninth Roman Legion leads the Doctor, Bill, and Nardole into the middle of an ancient battle that could cast humanity into the dark forever.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor makes a rash decision when he witnesses the death of somebody during the event horizon of a black hole.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor makes a final stand against an army of Cybermen, to protect a tiny band of humans from destruction.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Madame de Pompadour's dreams are being haunted by a stranger called the Doctor. When she finds the court of Versailles under attack from clockwork droids she tries to summon her mysterious Doctor to save the day.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: When the Doctor, Rose and Mickey head back to 2006 because of a TARDIS malfunction, they soon realize the planet they once called home is run by a fascist society and that the Cybermen may be planning an invasion.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Cybermen take control of London and start converting the populace. While Jackie falls under Lumic's control, the Doctor, Rose and Mickey are reduced to fugitives in a world of terror.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Rose finds herself further away from home than ever before, in the orbit of a Black Hole. Trapped with an Earth expedition and the mysterious Ood, the time-travellers face an even greater danger as something ancient beneath the surface begins to awake.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Rose battles the murderous Ood and the Doctor finds his every belief being challenged to the core when the Pit beckons. With the planet threatening to fall into the Black Hole, the Doctor must make the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: It's the end of an epic journey as two mighty armies wage war across the Earth, with the human race caught in the middle. But as an unstoppable terror emerges from beneath Torchwood, the Doctor faces an even greater dilemma.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor meets Martha Jones, a medical student in London, under unusual circumstances when her entire hospital is transported to the Moon.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: For Martha's first trip in the Tardis, the Doctor takes her back in time, to Elizabethan England. When they find William Shakespeare with a lost play, suspicions of evil are confirmed when deadly witch-like creatures are discovered.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Martha travel to New Earth in the distant future where they encounter sinister pharmacists and the Face of Boe.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor becomes John Smith, a human schoolteacher, to hide from alien villains in 1913 England.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: War breaks out in 1913 as aliens hunt for the Doctor.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A young woman finds cryptic messages from 1969 coming from a stranger called the Doctor when people start disappearing.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: After landing in an abandoned library in the 51st century, the Doctor, Donna and a team of archaeologists face a swarm of flesh-eating creatures that are seen only as shadows.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: As the shadows rise, the Doctor forges an alliance with the mysterious River Song. While the Doctor discovers secrets and revelations about his own future, the sinister Nodes declare that Donna is doomed.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor is trapped and powerless on the planet Midnight. A woman called Sky seems to hold the answers he needs, but paranoia takes hold of the Doctor and Sky turns his strengths against him.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the Doctor's absence, Harriet Jones assembles a secret army of Earth's greatest heroes to fight the Dalek Empire.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor is defenceless as the Daleks activate their master plan. The secret army sets out to battle Davros, knowing that it is prophesied that one of them will die.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve in 1851 and Cybermen stalk the snow of Victorian London. When the Doctor arrives and starts to investigate a spate of mysterious deaths, he's surprised to meet another Doctor, with his own sonic screwdriver and cockney assistant.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor finds himself and those around him in serious danger after a strange bus ride.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor helps combat a crisis from beneath Mars' surface.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The TARDIS collides with a spacecraft replica of the Titanic and the Doctor must make a stand against a race of android angels.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The human race rejoices as the ghosts of loved ones return home. But as the Doctor, Rose and Jackie investigate the Torchwood Tower, the whole of modern-day Earth threatens to fall.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The TARDIS lands in 1930s New York. In the midst of the Depression, people are disappearing off the streets. Meanwhile, at the very top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor's oldest enemies are at work, plotting their largest scheme yet.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Dalek Sec is reborn in human form and plans to build a Dalek empire in 1930s New York. While Martha fights for her life at the top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor must enter into an unholy alliance in order to change Dalek history forever.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the Doctor's absence, Harriet Jones assembles a secret army of Earth's greatest heroes to fight the Dalek Empire.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor is defenceless as the Daleks activate their master plan. The secret army sets out to battle Davros, knowing that it is prophesied that one of them will die.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor helps combat a crisis from beneath Mars' surface.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Amy arrive in one of the most important eras of Britain's past - World War Two. In a secret room beneath London, the infamous alien villains, the Daleks, are dreaming up a deadly plot.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor receives a message from his allies that the Pandorica, which allegedly holds the most fearsome being in the universe, is about to open.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Rory maintains a vigil for Amy while the Doctor is trapped in the Pandorica. The key to restoring the universe may lie with a little girl who still believes in stars.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: All of time and space hangs in balance by the shores of Lake Silencio in Utah; for this is the day the Doctor dies.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor takes on a new role as Cybermen invade the streets of London and old friends unite against old enemies. Meanwhile, questions remain as to whether the UNIT can contain Missy.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: When the skies of Earth are frozen by a mysterious alien force, Clara needs her friend, but no one can find the Doctor. As past deeds come back to haunt him, old enemies will come face-to-face.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Trapped and alone in a terrifying Dalek city, the Doctor is at the heart of an evil Empire; no sonic, no TARDIS, nobody to help. With his greatest temptation before him, he must try hard to resist.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a girl with a star in her eye leads to a terrifying chase across time and space. Bill's mind is opened to a Universe that is bigger and more exciting than she could possibly have imagined.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The magical final chapter of the twelfth Doctor's journey sees the Time Lord team up with his former self, the first ever Doctor, and a returning Bill Potts, for one last adventure.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The human race rejoices as the ghosts of loved ones return home. But as the Doctor, Rose and Jackie investigate the Torchwood Tower, the whole of modern-day Earth threatens to fall.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The TARDIS lands in 1930s New York. In the midst of the Depression, people are disappearing off the streets. Meanwhile, at the very top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor's oldest enemies are at work, plotting their largest scheme yet.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Dalek Sec is reborn in human form and plans to build a Dalek empire in 1930s New York. While Martha fights for her life at the top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor must enter into an unholy alliance in order to change Dalek history forever.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Clara is alone in Victorian London with a man she doesn't know, a dinosaur in the Thames, and a spate of deadly spontaneous combustions. The Doctor has changed. It's time you knew him.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A Dalek fleet surrounds a lone rebel ship and only the Doctor can help them.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: When Robots threaten Sherwood forest, the Doctor must join forces with Robin Hood to stop the evil reign of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Clara crash land on the moon to find a world of horror: a mining base full of corpses, vicious spider-like creatures poised to attack and a terrible dilemma.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Clara are on the most beautiful train in history speeding among the stars of the future. Unfortunately a deadly creature is stalking the passengers and once you see the mummy you only have 66 seconds to live.

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Three men set out to build three cabins in remote areas of the Alaskan Frontier. They will make preparations in the harsh Alaskan winter and race against time, the bitter cold, and the wilderness to complete their builds.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: As the summer season starts to thaw out in Alaska, the builders get underway. The Alaskan elements are stubborn at all three build sites, but a little ingenuity goes a long way.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Lee Raymond is struggling to get back on track after losing a month to bad weather. Meanwhile, Chuck had has perfect weather, but most of his labor is due to leave in less than a month so he's got to move hard and fast.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Jim Wagner and his family begin the long process of starting over; building roads, levelling ground, and trying to get their cabin back up. Meanwhile, Chuck's right-hand man, Ryan Beachy, has been tragically killed in a motorcycle accident.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: After battling the tragedy of the loss of his right-hand man, Ryan Beachy, Chuck Gerwig is back in the saddle and ready to finish the job that he and Ryan started months earlier.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Winter is fast approaching and now all three of the builders are finding themselves with less help to finish the massive tasks at hand.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: As the days get shorter and colder, and snow is visible on the highest peaks, the builders frantically race to get their homes sealed in.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Winter has arrived and the race is over. It's time for each of our builders to come to terms with their end games as they pack up and head home for the season. To say this year has been a challenge would be an understatement.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Hunting and fishing guide Bob May is building a new cabin on a remote island in southern Alaska, but first he needs to tear down the old, abandoned cabin.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: On a nearly deserted island of Alaska, Bob is forced to adapt to inferior lumber, changing weather conditions, and an 11-foot brown bear all causing havoc on the build site.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Learn how things are built differently in a state which experiences 100 earthquakes a day.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: A sub-contractor fails to show up at the jobsite for weeks pushing Bob further behind schedule. Meanwhile, Bob and his brother Rick contend with some furry troublemakers of the job site that are chewing through hoses, cables, and grocery bags.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: When you live this far off the grid, you need to be self-sufficient, whether it is using recycled oil, fishing for dinner, or installing hydro and wind energy systems. The insulation delays continue as Bob waits for a delinquent subcontractor.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: It's a sprint to the finish as Bob gets the cabin completed before his first paying customers arrive. Furniture and other items are installed at the last moment. He works 16-hour days, and goes over budget, but ends up with the cabin of his dreams.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: It's 'Bring your Brother to Work Day' in Thousand Oaks. Justin sinks his money into a unit with an interesting pair. Dave pushes Mary to the breaking point. Kenny finds the time to make a nice profit, piece by piece.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Huntington Beach, Darrell's insider information amplifies his investment considerably. Mary’s find cooks up some oversized accoutrements. Kenny takes advantage of others’ missteps to grab a unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: This time, Darrell might be at risk of losing the title of 'The King of Montebello.' Brandi and Jarrod find their way back to the auction with the help of some pocket tech. Casey bails himself out despite being confined with an infectious German.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The parking lot is tiny in Van Nuys, and Mary needs a little help managing it. Dave picks up a locker that turns out to be therapeutic, while Justin tries to show the rest of them how to make the most out of a unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: It's 'prison' hugs all around in the City of Orange. Brandi and Jarrod bring an old friend along to do the heavy lifting. Ivy finds his fun in the little things. Shana and Edwina crack themselves up with some snappy accessories.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rolling into Buena Park with their crew, Brandi and Jarrod pick up what may be the best of the worst. Kenny and his cousin glide through a locker that's only half decent. Ivy comes to the auction dressed to kill. Mary tries to turn up the volume.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Moreno Valley, Emily brings along her cowboy husband. Ivy is displeased at Mary’s fraternization with the auctioneer, and takes it out on her later.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Vegas Ladies show up in "Bourgie Brea," and find the place fascinating. Mary decides to deal with her storage stress by introducing a bit of yoga into her routine. Ivy and Dave go head-to-head on a giant pair of sister lockers.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Golf Films

programme.title: Golf Films
programme.desc: The story of the greatest accomplishment in golf history: Tiger Woods winning four majors in a row starting with a record-setting victory at the 2000 U.S. Open and culminating with the 2001 Masters.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: At Andy Cohen's junkyard, one thing's for certain: It's never boring. And this week's projects are especially interesting. Andy finds a 1931 Model A that looks like it just drove out of a movie about the Mob, and a 1963 VW Bug that needs some love.

programme.desc: It's baptism by fire when Joe and the boys resurrect a scorched '73 Pontiac Firebird. This barbecued bird is getting a complete muscle car overhaul. But a water-logged engine puts the brakes on the build.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: The Canadian military approach The Guild to help restore a 1940s FAT, field artillery tractor, to be used for military funerals. Meanwhile the army mechanics at the 2nd Regiment Royal Canadian Horse Artillery in Petawawa, Ontario work on the FAT's body.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: While attending the Pomona Swap Meet and Classic Car Show, David falls in love with a 1954 Fiat 500 Topolino, but the Lowriders are what really get his attention. Later, they head to San Diego where David gets to ride in a 1966 Lamborghini 400 GT.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David and Larry visit Keith Dean, a Southern California car builder known for his unique designs and movie cars. Larry loves Keith's work, so they search for a donor car at the Pomona Swap Meet and Classic Car Show for Larry's project with Keith.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David takes Larry to visit his friend Keith Dean, a builder and unique restorer with a famous family history of creating movie cars.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David visits his friend Tim 'The Hapi Hipi' again to check out his latest purchases: a '16 4-turbo, 1500 horsepower Bugatti Chiron and a Dodge Demon. Bart works on a '60s Westfalia Volkswagen Van and a 1983 Mercedes G Wagon.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Janice is speechless when David purchases a 1952 Panhard Dyna Brake Station Wagon at the Concours d'Lemon in CA, but has plenty to say when the 'lemon' is delivered to The Guild. David gets an unusual request from the Canadian Armed Forces.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David is shocked when a guy shows up with his 1966 Lancia Fulvia Zagato Sport, and wants to pass over the stewardship to David for almost $0. Janice starts repairs on a 1940s Indian Motorcycle, intent on switching from riding horses to horsepower.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice meet a ton of interesting people & cars during Monterey Car Week, including an incredible handcrafted 1949 Talbot-Lago T26 Grand Sport Coupé and the oldest Packard race car in existence, made in 1912.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: The Guild searches for new mechanics, while Ron is juggling a 1967 Chevrolet Chevelle SS and a 1973 Roadrunner used for drag racing. Mel does a 3-step paint job creating black chrome on a yellow 1970 Chevy C10 truck.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice discover the famous 1959 Old Yeller II raced by Carroll Shelby and Dan Gurney while in California for the annual Monterey Car Week. Ron encounters a puzzle of pipes while working on a 1951 Pontiac Chieftain.

programme.desc: David and Janice must pick seven unique cars for the Atlanta Concours d'Elegance's Magnificent Seven competition. Brad discovers that the engine in a 1935 Bugatti Aerolithe is in rough shape from extensive touring.

programme.desc: Liz is completely bed bound with severe lymphedema that makes it impossible to walk. Utterly isolated, with no friends, she battles depression, and lives with her mom who is too ill to take care of her. Liz desperately wants to become mobile.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Robin and her brother Chris are both obese and already lost a sibling to obesity. They plan to visit Dr. Now together when Chris suffers a stroke and can't go. Luckily for Robin, Chris's son Garrett, already 600lbs at age 20, is game to join the journey.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At over 700 pounds, Brianne undertakes a weight-loss journey to save her own life and faces an unexpected challenge to her fragile progress when her husband suffers a heart attack on a birthday she will never forget.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: A devoted girlfriend and loving aunt, Alicia is all smiles and laughter on the outside, but on the inside she is terrified that her addiction to food will kill her before she can marry her long-time love or watch her nieces grow up.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At nearly 1,000 pounds, Samantha is dangerously close to dying. To make matters worse, she's paid to eat by making videos online. If Samantha doesn't overcome her toxic relationship with food, she worries that she will leave her daughter motherless.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Sisters Amy and Tammy weigh over 1,000 pounds combined, and they must each lose significant weight to be eligible for bariatric surgery. After months of hard work, Amy gets approved while Tammy is rejected. Both sisters have astounding transformations.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: With pandemic safety protocols in place, Dr. Lee reopens her office. Monica has a large birthmark growing on the side of her face. Jackie has a melon-sized lump on the back of her shoulder. Reginald has large, rare growths on the back of his head.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Chris and Lisa join forces attempting to solve the childhood mystery of why a woman was separated from her birth family at the age of two. The miraculous journey resolves multiple family mysteries and reveals the most unexpected guest at a family funeral.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: In her search for her biological family, a DNA test reveals an unlikely family member, changing the woman's life forever.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Valerie's budget is unlimited thanks to Dad, but Mom disagrees with her sexy dress choices. Bride Napiera wants a ball gown, but both her mother and former TV mom' think form fitting is best.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Tony Danza makes his debut at the salon to help his Broadway co-star find the perfect bridal costume for her role in their new musical, 'Honeymoon in Vegas.' Ballerina Valerie wants a wedding gown that is nothing like her princess dance costumes.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: War veteran and bride-to-be Alicia has served in both Iraq and Afghanistan. Now, it's Randy's turn to give back to her by surprising this shocked bride with a VIP day at Kleinfeld. The surprises keep getting bigger and better all day long.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Southern bride Danielle gets some help from her girlfriends in the quest to find the perfect glamorous gown. Jen is having a beer-themed wedding, but wants her dress to be more traditional. Katie worries her large assets won't fit in her wedding gown.

programme.desc: Anny is frustrated with Robert's promised shopping spree. Tania and Syngin disagree on their future plans. Anna feels Mursel is asking too much from her. Emily goes into labor, but there are complications. Then, meet new couple Mike and Natalie.

programme.title: Fishing University
programme.desc: Charlie and Ray are joined by Kevin Lamar, CEO and his wife, Ginger Wilkins from soft Science Footwear at Long Lake in Alpena, Michigan. Soft Science offers supreme comfort for the outdoor lifestyle.

programme.title: Hank Parker's Outdoor Magazine
programme.desc: Hank Parker fishes Santee Cooper for largemouth bass with pro angler Marc Deschenes.

programme.title: Lindner's Fishing Edge
programme.desc: Al and Troy Lindner fish Lake Mohave for smallmouth bass.

programme.title: Lake Commandos
programme.desc: Join Steve Pennaz and a guest as they break down new water and try to out-fish each other.

programme.title: Hook n' Look
programme.desc: Exploring the lake bottom for an up close look into the fish's neighbourhood.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Best Boat
programme.desc: The SeaArk 210 Bay, Belzona 27CC and the Stamas 370 Aegean are profiled.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Watermen
programme.desc: At Vero Beach Florida, seatrout is targeted. The issues faced in recent years discussed due to the loss of seagrass when it comes to targeting these species.

programme.title: Bill Boyce's Cali
programme.desc: Bill Boyce goes after marlin and tuna on Catalina Island.

programme.title: Modern Fishing With Jared Jeffries
programme.desc: Jared introduces all that awaits in season three.

programme.title: George Poveromo's World of Saltwater Fishing
programme.desc: Kayak fishing specialist Bri Andrassy accompanies George Poveromo to familiar waters in Key West.

programme.title: Here's the Catch!
programme.desc: Italo and his guest Tyler DeGraff locate and catch trophy amberjacks and mackerel.

programme.title: Big Coast Sportfishing
programme.desc: Salty air, hulking salmon. Get some wide-open angling action on the mighty Pacific.

programme.desc: Rob Fordyce meets up with Army veteran Jim Graham on the Wise River in Montana.
